text: Wanganyao ni awala wawapele Allah chindimba, mwa achimitume, mu wanache wa Adam, ni mu awala watwajigele pamo ni Nuhu (mâ€™chombo), ni mu wanache wa Ibrahima ni Israila, ni mu awala watwajongwele ni kwasagula. Pati gachisoomedwaga kukwao ma Aya ga (Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji, akasasenjelemukukaga kusujudu aku anankulila
